resources.string: Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow MokoPlugPro use the Storage and location permission
Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow MokoPlugPro use the bluetooth and location permission
MokoPlugPro requires access to Storage and location permission. If the permissions are not on, MokoPlugPro cannot be used normally.
After that, MokoPlugPro could search and connect with the device
Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow MokoPlugPro use the Location permission
MokoPlugPro requires access to Location permission. If the permissions are not on, MokoPlugPro cannot be used normally.
MokoPlugPro requires access to bluetooth scan contract and location permission. If the permissions are not on, MokoPlugPro cannot be used normally.
Are you sure you want to quit?

string-array.name: power_indicator_color
string-array.item: Active power indicator with color direct transition
Active power indicator with color smooth transition
